name: In the Bizarre Invasion, I Took Over the Body of the God of Death and Became the King
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: Su Mu is reborn and re-enters the “Apocalypse” system, facing deadly situations where Death itself comes knocking and an array of demons and eerie creatures awaken to threaten the world. Against all odds, he turns the tables and becomes an unstoppable king, joining his teammates in a desperate fight to reverse their fate and ignite a nationwide awakening and evolution.Original Webtoon: AC.QQ, BiliBili
